3. A companion of choice is recommended for all women 
throughout labour and childbirth.

Continuity of care 4. Midwife-led continuity-of-care models, in which a known 
midwife or small group of midwives supports a woman 
throughout the antenatal, intrapartum and postnatal 
continuum, are recommended in settings with well-
functioning midwifery programmes.
